remarks: The norm of an operator is nonnegative.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmoxr.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmoxr.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmoxr.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmooge0 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T : X --> Y ) -> 0 <_ ( N ` T ) ) $.
